body_html: @psyhtest - yeah I looked into this yesterday, and found the same link you pointed out. I was able to get the Raspberry Pi nightlies to build by adding --copt=-DPNG_ARM_NEON_OPT=0 - see (jessebenson@b135e2d). I didn't include this in my pull request (#18892), as I'm not sure if that's the desired fix.
body_text: @psyhtest - yeah I looked into this yesterday, and found the same link you pointed out.  I was able to get the Raspberry Pi nightlies to build by adding --copt=-DPNG_ARM_NEON_OPT=0 - see (jessebenson@b135e2d).  I didn't include this in my pull request (#18892), as I'm not sure if that's the desired fix.
body: @psyhtest - yeah I looked into this yesterday, and found the same link you pointed out.  I was able to get the Raspberry Pi nightlies to build by adding `--copt=-DPNG_ARM_NEON_OPT=0` - see (https://github.com/jessebenson/tensorflow/commit/b135e2d9a234e23cebc7b6d63043b40b07e76a1a).  I didn't include this in my pull request (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/18892), as I'm not sure if that's the desired fix.
